revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WA730RE |revision=v1.x |upc=191120100562 |asin=B00JZDZOY0 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |price=20 |fcc_date=04/15/2010 |fcc_id=TE7WA730RE |ic_id=8853A-WA730RE |pcb_id=2053500025 |type=extender, range extender |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed=350 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL032PIF |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40FTP-G5 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9285 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|150Mbps Wireless Range Extender}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=242&model=TL-WA730RE Product page] (current pictures show the v2 unit) {{â€¢}} [http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-WA730RE&version=V1 Downloads]
"11n Access Point-6 (AR) A" and "REV:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The device is using a ''Group-Tek'' Ethernet transformer.
*{{TechInfoDepot|TP-LINK_TL-WA730RE_v1}}
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wa730re ''TP-LINK TL-WA730RE v1'' on '''OpenWrt wiki''']
===Firmware=== Unlike the [[TP-LINK TL-WA730RE v2]], this device lacks a power button :and does have support for ''DD-WRT''. *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=156287 Main thread on the '''DD-WRT Forum'''] *[http://svn.dd-wrt.com/ticket/2587 Ticket #2587 on the ''DD-WRT Trac'' regarding adding support for the device]
I have managed to get OpenWrt working on this, all I needed to do was to flash :the [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=24940 firmware for the WA701ND v1 ], as they are are identical hardware wise. This does not include a WebUI, so you have to be connected to the internet in order :to get the WebUI. This is completely unofficial! [[User:George109|George109]] ([[User talk:George109|talk]])
__NOTOC__
